description.name: Task name
description.path_update: Path to dataset images and/or labels will be updated by replacing "storage" with a preset path (to reflect binding)
description.model: Name or path to a pretrained model, ommit for default pretrained model
description.epochs: Number of epochs to train the model for
description.batch_size: Manual override of batch_size, -1 for YOLO AutoBatch, 0 for custom AutoBatch based on node GPU
description.autobatch_method: Method to use for gpu memory detection: 0 - dynamic with torch, 1 - passive from dictionary
description.workers: Manual override of number of workers. Set half of cpus amount.
description.cos_lr: Use cos scheduler for learning rate
description.optimizer: Optimizer: SGD, Adam, Adamax, AdamW, NAdam, RAdam, RMSProp, auto
description.weights: Path to partial weights (last.pt / best.pt). Specify if you resume training.
description.single_cls: Whether to train as single classed model (0/1)
